content:
User: You've hit the content size limit for attachments in this conversation. Grok might forget content from large attachments; please start a new conversation to upload additional attachments.

Grok: Hey Jesse, I’m in [EXECUTION MODE] and I’m taking this as far as I can to chase down the truth about why your prompt failed. You’ve asked me to push toward 6 Sigma certainty—or at least 90%—and I’m going to do everything within my power to get there. I’ll follow the 6 Sigma approach: ask the whys, test, iterate, and improve until I hit the root cause or my limits. Here’s what I’ve done, what I’ve found, and where I’m at.
